thread.title: Enjoyable Stay in this hotel!
thread.title_full: Enjoyable Stay in this hotel! - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Low L
title: Enjoyable Stay in this hotel!
text:
Very comfortable room withgreat and friendly staff. Enjoyed the morning walk around the hotel. There's a free shuttle to Burlingame where you can get more food and shopping. There's a Japanese restaurant just across the road and they serve authentic Japanese cuisine with sake.
Room Tip: room facing the courtyard See more room tips
